website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a high-quality rustic sheet set that won't fray or fade after a few uses, this Greenland Home product is a great option.
pros: In addition to high-quality construction that holds up well over time, this set is beautiful
Reversible and fits with almost any color sheets
cons: This set runs a bit small, so we recommend ordering a size up for anything less than a king size

customer_reviews.title: Get it size larger to cover your bed
customer_reviews.text: I found no flaws. Shams have bows instead of zippers which I liked. I loved the colors. It's the right weight to use as a light quilt. BUT it does NOT cover the bed as shown. I bought a queen for a double bed and had to buy a bed skirt because it doesn't come down on the sides. This one shows the spread nearly to floor at foot of bed. Must be they didn't pull it very far up!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: For decoration only
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking it would be similar to the heavy bed spreads you find in motels and such. However, this blanket is very light and thin. Using it at night provides no warmth. It is nice looking, I like the colors, however the stitching is cheap. I had it for about a month before some of the quilting threads started coming loose. All in all, I would recommend this product for decoration, but not for practical use of a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow911

customer_reviews.title: A pretty reversible bedspread
customer_reviews.text: This quilt looks beautiful on the bed in our summer home. It really brightens up the room which has tan walls and dark wood cabinets. It's well made. The set includes a quilt and two pillow shams. It's reversible and I like both sides. It's nice to be able to vary the look. The side shown has multicolored stripes. The reverse has stripes in various shades of blue and brown/tan. The blend is predominately blue.The stripes make it easy and quick to put on the bed which is a big help in a summer home where there are many more fun things to do than making beds!
customer_reviews.author: mystery lover

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Going to complain through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it since February and already the ends are tearing. See photo. Not happy. Going to complain through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SpectacularSix

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed Cover Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with this purchase. I needed something for our guest room, and now it looks amazing. This lightweight quilt pulled in colors from our wine colored drapes, to the light blue carpet perfectly. I also believe you could use the blue side of this comforter, it seems to be stitched in a way that it could be reversible. The sham however is not reversable. I saw a review that said theirs didn't wash well, but I washed this on gentle, with cold water, and all is just perfect. Nicely made, worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny242

customer_reviews.title: Virant colors ruined when it was laundered.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this quilt . . . so much that I reordered another one WHEN I took the first one to be laundered and the color leached out and turned it into a limp thing. The directions say "Machine wash", by the way. I am going to try to return it since this is the first time it has been laundered/cleaned. I am hoping that when I have it dry cleaned the rich, vibrant colors will remain because it now looks old and faded.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: The quilt is nice enough, but the colors aren't as muted/sophisticated as ...
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! Do NOT to wash this quilt or matching the pillow shams with any other items. The colors bleed a LOT and will stain everything in the same wash load. The quilt is nice enough, but the colors aren't as muted/sophisticated as they look online. They are much, much brighter (as someone else commented, think college dorm decor) so I'm disappointed not to be able to use this quilt as I had planned. I'm using the blue striped reverse side for now, which is okay, but can't use the shams because they're not reversible and the colors are just over the top for my taste. Maybe they will fade with more time and washing, as other reviewers have noted.
customer_reviews.author: la critique

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - true to picture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful - true to picture. Wish it were a bit longer to cover our queen mattress more like is shown in the photo, but still good. Any bumps or wrinkles in the sheets underneath show through.
customer_reviews.author: MTUCK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and looks nice on the bed.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. I’ve never ordered this brand before so I did not know what to expect. The quilt is made of strong material, the craftsmanship is good, and it’s a reasonable weight. It’s not a heavy quilt per se, but the weight and construction are comparable to more expensive brands. I washed the quilt and shams before using, and everything came out looking good. I like the pattern and that the quilt is reversible. I wish the shams were too! The stripes match everything. Overall very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quilt, but stripes are wavy in several areas.  This might just be a fluke with the one I received.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are less vibrant than in the picture, but the colors are still very attractive. I purchase the king to use on my queen bed and it fits more like a bedspread. My problem with it is that in several places, the stripes are not sewn straight, so there is a waviness that doesn't look right. I am returning it for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this quilt. I originally bought the King for my Queen size bed because these usually run small, but this does not. I returned the set for the Queen size and it is perfect. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jillanne M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for months for just the right bed coverings for my "grand-kids room" where I have 3 twin beds and when I got this I knew it was perfect! I just love the weight of the fabric. It's not so heavy like a fluffy comforter and light enough to wash in my home washing machine. For the colder months I added a light thermal blanket for a little extra warmth. I especially like the look and feel of the natural cotton fabric and that was a must for me. The colors are bright enough but a bit subdued...just what I wanted. I paired it with a denim bed skirt and it looks great! Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA J WATKINS

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun Set at an Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: At this point, I cannot speak as to how well it will wash, but I love the colors -- it gives you a wide range of choices for sheet colors that will match. I tend to keep things neutral and low-key for decor, and it has added an eye-pleasing offset of color in my bedroom. It looks like it will wash well, but I will definitely wash it in cold on delicate when I do; and let it air-dry for maximum color retention.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McBrair

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Color Scheme and Design
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color scheme/pattern of this quilt. I'm a guy, living in a uniquely painted apartment, and wanted a quilt that would kind of match the walls and be versatile enough to still work when I move to a place with normal, boring, white walls. Quilt is light weight. I haven't had any issues overheating or with quality yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I love the feeling of it as well - it FEELS ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute quilt! I love the feeling of it as well - it FEELS like it's put together well. Although, the first one I received, I did have to send it back for a replacement, because the stitching on one part of it was coming apart and done poorly. The replacement I received did not have any flaws in the stitching and looks just beautiful. I'm just hoping it doesn't come apart over times with washes. I probably won't dry it in the dryer - just to keep it in best of shape as I possibly can.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower Meadow

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a Southwester motif to my bedroom and this goes great. This is my second Greenland quilt the other is in my guest room and has a beach theme with different blues in similar stripping. Lightweight so works year round.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyG

customer_reviews.title: Great quilt
customer_reviews.text: I do love this quilt, but it's thin. Just be forewarned. Not for very cold temperatures. It is gorgeous and represented well in the photographs. I love it also because it goes with every sheet set I already own, even a printed paisley one that has the same colors as the quilt. It fits my king bed with lots of overhang, so it's quite nice and large. And the price is the best on the internet after searching for the same one on other sites. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda C. Elsaesser

customer_reviews.title: Fades
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I bought it. I purchased this on 4-28-2020. Obviously it has needed washed. Cold water, gentle cycle. The shams and comforter are washed together but noticed that they have faded drastically, and not even the same!! They have all faded but the shams have more color still then the comforter. Thought it was my eyes but grandaughter confirmed it!
customer_reviews.author: jayoung5754

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Like that this is reversible and that it is cotton. Perfect for warmer weather. The colors will fit in with any decor. The sizing for a queen is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: herb lady

customer_reviews.title: Bright Colors
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and has vibrant colors! We washed it and let it air dry before we used it on the bed. It came out great! Not too heavy where is hurts your feet. Not so light it slides off either. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: The colors are so pretty--not too bright, not too dull. It could work in so many rooms. Mine is sage walls with mostly blue accents, but I can add splashes of yellow or red and it will all tie in. Not a thick quilt, but I did not want that. After washing, it sort of crinkles (?) like quilts do. Maybe you could iron it, but I like the lived-in look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Teri L. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Striped spread with two shams
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this spread for several months now and got it to replace a heavier one that was just way too hot!!! This one is just PERFECT!!! Not too heavy or too light. And the colors in it are great. Will go with so many things.
customer_reviews.author: P. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Color was correct, a little thin
customer_reviews.text: The color looks just like it did on the Amazon pictures, which helps a lot when you're ordering a multi-colored bedcovering. The only drawbacks for me is the material is a bit thin, which worries me because we have dogs. Also it's a bit short. I realize "Queen" means a certain size, but my quilt needs to cover the mattress, sheets and blankets. And this ones does JUST barely. I probably should order King size to get the coverage I really want.
customer_reviews.author: RRR

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and design
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I've purchased for our beach rental. The first one held up really well but a renter got an ink stain on it that wouldn't come out. I saw the same quilt at a fun, beachy furniture store in their display room! That said, it's not specifically beachy, and is very versatile. It's not that soft and not super warm, either, just fyi. And the stitching isn't 100% perfect, but it's nicely made for "these days." Very nice set for the price. And it reverses to a blue-tones stripe that you could use if you wanted, but I like the colorful side much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but in less than a year, it's falling apart already!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time seeking out a quilt I would like. At first, I felt this one was a little too light...but with a light blanket, it's perfect. I love the colors and the look. I wash it according to directions, but today I noticed that it's already starting to come apart near a seam. Disappointed that I'll have to spend another $70 to hopefully get another year's worth of use out of one. Hopefully, there is something like a warranty...
customer_reviews.author: J Lamb

customer_reviews.title: If you have a Queen sized bed purchase the King!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the full/queen. I should have gotten the King. The fit is very skimpy on my queen sized bed. I love the colors tho, and also purchased the throw for the end of the bed where my dog sleeps. It is lightweight for Winter' this will be my Summer quilt.
customer_reviews.author: embp

customer_reviews.title: Coming unstitched after less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I washed this quilt when I received it in cold water, gentle cycle. It has been on bed for less than 3 months and I noticed it is starting to come unstitched at the seams. Called manufacturer, they directed me to Amazon Retail Services, who in turn directed me to Amazon Warranties department, who directed me to call the manufacturer. Very disappointed with the quality of the quilt, but even more disappointed in the quality of customer service I received.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: With the price
customer_reviews.text: Like most similar designs, it isn't warm but works well with other blankets. But the colors are really good on either reversible option.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hornbeck

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and more!
customer_reviews.text: I love this quilt set! It’s beautiful, versatile and looks like pure quality. It’s reversible too! One side is warm rainbow and the other is light to dark blues. It washes up like a dream and has withstood our dog and cats really well. I’d buy another in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: dray

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: This is an adequate bedspread. Thought it would be a little lighter in weight so I use it mostly in the fall. It is hard to wash because of the heaviness.
customer_reviews.author: BABRunner

customer_reviews.title: Light and Bright
customer_reviews.text: I returned this spread, not for lack of quality. It was too pastel for my bedroom. I needed warmer colors. If you want light and bright, you will like this spread.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Barran

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this design, material, and stitching. The colors are exactly as viewed online, and the dimensions were right on target. The material felt comfortable as soon as I pulled out of the package. I would still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Seams coming apart- less than two months old
customer_reviews.text: We bought this quilt May 19, 2016 and just noticed (July 11, 2016) that the seams are coming apart at several places. I wouldn't recommend this product. Buy a quality spread from a manufacturer or specialty shop where you can return items if there is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Totally exceeded expectaions.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quilt or comforter that could be washed and that I could coordinate with the caramel colored walls. I got a denim blue rug for under the 2 twin beds and it looks beautiful. Very warm and inviting. I read the reviews before purchasing this quilt set and I think the quality is very good, it easily covers the bed and side rails. I washed it before using it and the colors stayed vibrant. The sham problem was solved by stuffing it with 2 pillows, or a queen size pillow could be used also.
customer_reviews.author: LNspins

customer_reviews.title: classic lines
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and colorful addition to linens. Perfect for bland colored room to give it a little pop.
customer_reviews.author: john hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these in the twin size to put on the back of our couches (folded) so the cats cannot scratch the leather. The quilts are very pretty and look great in our SW style home. The colors are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors in this quilt set for my rustic bedroom. Quality seems good, there is a mismatched strip almost in the middle of the quilt, however it is not very noticeable. Overall pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this blanket but it did not hold up as well as I would have thought. Some places it came apart
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and size
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and size. The quilt is larger than one I purchased in a local store, supposedly also a king. I haven't washed it yet, but so far it is fantastic! It is the perfect weight for summer sleeping, too!
customer_reviews.author: olylauren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable Quilt Set
customer_reviews.text: PROS: The quilt set looks amazing on our bed. I absolutely love the colors and feel. The quilt feels heady but sleeping with it is great! We were looking for a lighter weight summer blanket for our bed. Something that was cooler, breathable and not thick. This one definitely met our needs. CON: We washed it right when we got it on gentle cycle in our front load Washer and when I made the bed, I noticed it was already starting to come apart on the seam in 1 area just as others had noted in their review.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, pet friendly and washes great!
customer_reviews.text: We have owed this set for about three years. It washed beautifully, and is the perfect weight for both Spring and Fall. There are a few snags from our dogs claws, but he is 75 lbs. It has lasted longer then our previous quilts. I will likely purchase again once our current one needs to be replaced. Highly recommended for pet owners, or vacation rentals.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love the Katy Quilt Set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a king size for my queen guest bed. The corners are long so I just folded at an angle and tacked them. Don’t want anyone tripping over the excess material. I am so happy with the fit otherwise. I was able to get rid of need for a dust ruffle.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B.

customer_reviews.title: Great bedspread
customer_reviews.text: A great bed spread. Very durable my cat spends the day on out bed (I suspect the dog joins him) so I need to wash it frequently. I holds up through frequent washes. I bought a king size for my queen size bed because I think it fits better and I have king pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley E Gage

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. This quilt goes with just about everything. It really brightened up my bedroom (I have very dark furniture and carpet and it was bit dreary). Good quality. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Queen size would have been too small to fit the bed.
customer_reviews.text: Goes in a guest bedroom so will be used very seldom. To early to rate the "Rate Features" above. Ordered King size for my queen bed. Too short on length and hemmed up about 3" on the sides to make it fit like I wanted. Liked the colors in the spread. Since I purchased a king size I had to reduce the length of the pillow shams. Think it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: SIS

customer_reviews.title: Great quilt for the price
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I wanted something very casual so I could lounge on it and it was just what I expected. The material feels just like the old fashioned cotton quilts that folk here in the south use to make. It is lightweight enough to use even in summer when your air conditioner blows too cold. The colors are nice and slightly muted but exactly as pictured. I have not washed it but it looks like it will hold up well. The size was as expected and as shown (you need a dust ruffle).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Hubby and I agreed on this to bring some color to our bedroom without him having to sleep under anything "too flowery". Love that we can flip it to blues if we want. For our King sized bed with a deep mattress (select comfort plus a 3" memory foam topper)...it just barely makes it to the top of the box springs. Wish it were about 12 inches wider. That's my only complaint. Other than that, great quality and comfy warm.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quilt!
customer_reviews.text: Love this quilt! It is oversized and fits the king bed perfectly! The colors are not quite as vibrant as the picture but it is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Fits perfectly and looks great. Really nice quality. Multi colored so will fit in with many accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie E Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Had a slight defect, but the seller was super responsive and sent me a replacement right away!! This is a beautiful bedspread and super quality!
customer_reviews.author: Justine George

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rich vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rich vibrant colors. Nice high quality feel to the fabric. Only bad thing was that it arrived with a lot of threads hanging that had to be clipped closely so that it wouldn't unravel.... Love it and happy to have made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schisler

customer_reviews.title: Colors are true to picture
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight , I wouldn't have minded a little more weight but it's not as thin as some I've purchased. Nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy for Florida but still very good quality. Washes well and colors hold up after 2 plus years of using and washing it. That is almost too much to ask these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper SD

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Beautiful quilt and pillow shams!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this quilt set. It looks exactly like it does in the picture. I have washed it twice with no fading, or shrinking. The fabric is soft, comfortable, and is not too heavy or too light. There are so many colors in the quilt so it is very versatile. I am very pleased with this quilt, it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color pattern. We use it on our sleeping porch. Nice quality quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C. Lahout

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Very well made. The colors are bright, just like the picture. I also ordered the curtains which are also quilted. Looks great in room. Great quality and price. I ordered the skirt in tan. I think now is choose another color but still looks wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: sharon c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size King Quilt, Great Color and Washes Well!
customer_reviews.text: The comforter set was exactly as pictured. The underside is shades of blue, so you can reverse between the colorful side and blue side. I love that it is oversized enough to truly cover the king-size bed and it fits in my 4.9 cubic foot washer. Very comfortable in all weather. Extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a queen
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, but much too skimpy for a queen bed. I had to return it
customer_reviews.author: dotla

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made. Seems like a super good quality quilt. There are hues of soft orange, beige, and grayish-blue in the fabric. Very classic.
customer_reviews.author: SES

customer_reviews.title: Really generous size. Nice colours. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quilt and a good value. Nice shams. The quilt is a generous size and covers beautifully. Bought another quilt for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: OVERALL A BEAUTIFUL QUILT
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful quilt and goes great with many different changes out of color in your bedroom
customer_reviews.author: glenda

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his birthday. He is a quilt man and the colors were bright and the comforter is so comfortable. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: quilt
customer_reviews.text: I love this quilt. It fits perfectly on my king bed and the colors are true to the pictures. I also love that it is reversible.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia J. Stanner

customer_reviews.title: Greenland Home Katy King Quilt Set
customer_reviews.text: The color is much more vibrant than shown. This is the first quilt that actually fits my king size bed, all the others were too short on all sides. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Black Sheep

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but material ripped
customer_reviews.text: I had to repair the before I even put it on the bed. Luckily this is for a guest bedroom and isn't used very often because I don't think this will hold up very long. After washing I noticed several more small tears.
customer_reviews.author: Cousin Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Just love this. Durable
customer_reviews.text: Just love this. Durable, washes well, great colors, warm enough to use alone in warmer weather. I bought another one for my day bed and yet another for a twin. Love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Cashion

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high end quilts. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: High quality quilts!! Love them. Great colors and really nice cotton fabric. Soft right out of the package. I usually wash everything before using it. But there was no need to with these. They did not smell of factory or plastic. They are soft and lovely colors. Would highly recommend Bridget Fairfax, VA
customer_reviews.author: Bridget B.

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to repair the Quilt
customer_reviews.text: The Greenland Home Katy King Quilt fits my king bed very nicely. Even hangs down on the sides! The colors are beautiful. However, I had to repair it in several places (tears). Not a fan of having to do that on a new purchase!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: but I still love the
customer_reviews.text: Not as wide as I thought it would be, but I still love the print
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is beautiful and at first, appeared to be well made....until it began to fall apart one wash and only three months later. In two different places, the stitching is coming apart. Of course, it's beyond the return window so i'll make an attempt to sew it myself but should not have to.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy P.

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors in this lightweight comforter
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in our spare/guest bedroom. Love the colors in this lightweight comforter.
customer_reviews.author: GMa Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quilt.
customer_reviews.text: lightweight enough for summer and fall it.mine did come with a couple areas where they stitched off line so it looked like the material was ripped, it wasn't, it just was stitched off line. it has held up to multiple washings though so worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lovec

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Constructed
customer_reviews.text: Colors vibrant, sized generously for a queen bed. I wanted my guest room to have a coastal look without looking like a beach decor theme park. The soft color pallet lends itself to accessorize with a wide variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: All cotton
customer_reviews.text: Just got this a couple of weeks ago. The color scheme will go with lots of different decor. With a sheet, a cotton blanket, and this comforter, it is the perfect level of warmth on cold midwestern night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was for my Grandmother and she loves it! The colors are nice and there were no problems with loose strings or stitching. It's nice and soft, and the reverse side is nice, blue, so it's like 2 looks in one. The blanket could have been a little bigger for better hang, but still great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbee

customer_reviews.title: A Great Decision!
customer_reviews.text: I love color. This set establishes the tone for the other accessories for my room. So glad I chose this set. Comfortable to sleep under in spring with no additional blanket. I'm very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: j.c.davis

customer_reviews.title: An ideal camp/cabin look at a more affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: It seems well made and has that camp effect we are trying for. It isn't super thick, but it does the job. This said, we got it for its appearance more than its warm qualities, though we were hoping for both and it has done the job nicely! Here, Joey, our super smart and loving Cavachon hybrid guest and Chewy, our chubby Chihuahua are demonstrating its durability under pressure! It has held up!
customer_reviews.author: CampPawsum

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with Greenland Home katy Quilt Set
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for quilts to use on two twin beds that I use in a spare bedroom when my grand children visit. I needed a quilt that worked for both boys and girls. This quilt can match any wall color and looks great with any color wood. Perfect weight, can be used over another blanket or quilt in the winter and alone in nicer weather.
customer_reviews.author: TeeDee

customer_reviews.title: I love these quilts!
customer_reviews.text: I love these quilts! I already have 2 that I use to protect my leather sofas from my dogs. They are beautiful, well made and easy to wash. They also add a nice punch of color in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda D.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two sets for a bunk bed. I'll be using these for the grandkids' room and love the fact that the color & pattern are gender neutral. However, one of the two sets arrived dirty - small spots of who-knows-what that did come off. Still, it was not appropriate to arrive dirty.
customer_reviews.author: GramFall4

customer_reviews.title: I love this, the colors are rich
customer_reviews.text: I love this, the colors are rich, exactly as shown. And it is a true King size, I was afraid it would be smaller, but it is perfect. I'm very happy with this quilt and the shams are nice and oversized too.
customer_reviews.author: kscon

customer_reviews.title: The yellow and the orange stands out but not in a bad way. I may just notice it because our ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit brighter than I had expected. The yellow and the orange stands out but not in a bad way. I may just notice it because our last cover was a very dark purple. I bought this based on recommendations from dog owners. It is a sturdy fabric that I also agree should hold up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Megan W.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made item
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly manufactured. The quilt has only been washed one (in the 'gentle' cycle) and its coming apart at the seams
customer_reviews.author: Alex L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Quilt Set
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the quilt set that I had been looking for and the sides are reversible (blue on flip side). The pillow covers are large enough for comfy bed pillows and have two wide ties to hold the covers closed. The quilt works well as a bedspread or as a throw at the foot of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Pi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, good looking. A heavy weight that stays where you put it. Washes beautifully no shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Ocala

customer_reviews.title: Good for
customer_reviews.text: This will go with any color in your room. Light weight. Good for summer
customer_reviews.author: Catherine B. Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Quilt Set
customer_reviews.text: My teenage nephew absolutely loves the colors in this quilt and the weight of the quilt. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia White

customer_reviews.title: Color's are great can so many sheets an pillows !
customer_reviews.text: Also have the matching throw,placed at end of bed ! Looks nice and if I need a light cover it's there .
customer_reviews.author: helen louise

customer_reviews.title: Color still good after a year
customer_reviews.text: Had for over a year and the color still looks good. No problems with stitching. I'm very pleased with this quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Prescott Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Haven't washed yet,so I don't know about how well it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom looks great with this quilt! Added a lot of charm and the joy to the room. Loved it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bed Set
customer_reviews.text: The order was processed quickly, and recieved it before the due date. I love this set. I always recieve compliments when my guest see it.
customer_reviews.author: Russell L. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the online picture. It is beautiful. I am completely satisfied. Price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: gincor

customer_reviews.title: Great Quilt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and matching valance. Love all the different colors as I it gives me several different paint color choices and/ or carpet for our bedroom decor. Good quality and comfortable to sleep with. Price on Amazon was great! Even better than pictured .Very happy I took a chance online
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Marvel

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional color and weight for versatile bed cover with shams.
customer_reviews.text: Versatile strong line borders of color within a middle weight weave. Ideal fit and product and would refer for future brand and provider options
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love this quilt
customer_reviews.text: Warm while being light weight. Multi-colored in warm rich jewel tones. Color variation goes with a variety of sheet colors.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Using these quilts on twin XL beds at our shore house. Terrific quality, great price. I like that they're reversible, and take a lot of punishment from kids. The kids say that they're warm but not heavy. All around, a really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Nan L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Still not quite wide enough. I prefer bedspread size because i cant use a dust ruffle. Very pretty! Love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something colorful for the master bedroom. This quilt set is not only colorful, but it's also beautiful, well made, and holds up after washing. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

product_meta.title: Greenland Home Katy Quilt Set, King, Natural
product_meta.description: Size:KingChic and versatile, the Katy quilt set features a broad range of colors. With a variety of stripes to compliment any bedroom theme, Katy reverses to a neutral blue. Channel stitching adds surface interest and durability. Oversized for better coverage on today’s deeper mattresses. Prewashed and preshrunk. All cotton face, back and fill. Set includes: Quilt and two pillow shams (one sham per twin set). Dimensions: Twin set includes one 68x88-inch quilt and one 20x26-inch pillow sham; Full/Queen set includes one 90x90-inch quilt and two 20x26-inch pillow shams; King set includes one 105x95-inch quilt and two 20x36-inch pillow shams. All-cotton. Imported.
feature_bullets: Oversized and channel stitching adds surface interest and durability, machine washable
Complete Set Including standard sized 20x26 inch pillow shams

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
